t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The Amazon logo is composed of a wordmark “Amazon” in the lowercase letters. Under the lettering there is a smooth and bold yellow arrow, coming from the letter “A” to “Z”, forming a smile. t: Amazon Logo and its History | LogoMyWay
s: Amazon was founded by Jeff Bezos in 1994 under the name “Cadabra”. In a testament to the importance of thoughtful branding, though, Bezos would change the name a year later to “Amazon” after realizing the original name’s phonic resemblance to the word cadaver.
